description: Optimized Perplexity Search skill for OpenClaw. Provides ranked web results and persistent chat history specifically tuned for OpenClaw agents, including reliability guidelines to prevent system hangs during deep research.

tools.name: ask_perplexity
tools.title: Ask Perplexity
tools.description: Provides expert programming assistance through Perplexity. Focuses on coding solutions, error debugging, and technical explanations. Returns responses with source citations and alternative suggestions.

query.description: Technical question or problem to solve

tools.name: chat_perplexity
tools.title: Chat with Perplexity
tools.description: Maintains ongoing conversations with Perplexity AI. Creates new chats or continues existing ones with full history context. Returns chat ID for future continuation.

message.description: New message to add to the conversation

chat_id.description: ID of an existing chat to continue. If not provided, a new chat will be created and title is required.

title.description: Title for the new chat. Required when creating a new chat (when chat_id is not provided).

tools.name: list_chats_perplexity
tools.title: List Chats
tools.description: Lists all available chat conversations with Perplexity AI. Returns chat IDs, titles, and creation dates. Results are paginated with 50 chats per page.

tools.name: read_chat_perplexity
tools.title: Read Chat History
tools.description: Retrieves the complete conversation history for a specific chat. Returns the full chat history with all messages and their timestamps. No API calls are made to Perplexity - this only reads from local storage.

chat_id.description: ID of the chat to retrieve
